item.title: By: TheLOVEofurlife
item.dc:creator: TheLOVEofurlife
item.description: I just wanted to say that I had to google what "DRM" was, you know there are some people who read your blog that don't know everything about digital media and tech stuff. Just a heads up and a definition or synopsis sometime would help... by the way i actually love the first place t-shirt winner!! love ya
item.content:encoded: I just wanted to say that I had to google what “DRM” was, you know there are some people who read your blog that don’t know everything about digital media and tech stuff. Just a heads up and a definition or synopsis sometime would help… by the way i actually love the first place t-shirt winner!! love ya
